body:
This represents the official release of Apicurio Studio, version 0.2.24.Final.

The following issues have been resolved in this release:

* [#688](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/688) Error when initializing MySQL database, table codegen, Invalid default value for 'modified_on'
* [#685](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/685) Upgrade to angular7
* [#684](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/684) Error on query parameter for OData api that starts with $ sign
* [#683](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/683) Error when importing huge yml/json (larger than 65KB)  with a MySQL database: Data too long for column 'data' at row 1
* [#682](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/682) Wildfly issue with docker
* [#678](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/678) Bump scala-maven-plugin from 4.0.0 to 4.0.1
* [#676](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/676) Empty inline text editor should hide the "clear" button. Fixes #607
* [#675](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/675) Modifications are not saved
* [#674](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/674) Validate that the media type has not already been added in "Add Media…
* [#673](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/673) Postgres connection problem
* [#672](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/672) Bump scala-maven-plugin from 3.4.6 to 4.0.0
* [#671](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/671) Store examples as strings only for types not representable in JSON/YAML
* [#663](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/663) Operation SR adds No Security to the main level SR
* [#652](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/652) Publish: Errors fetching Orgs/Teams/Repos (etc) should be surfaced in the UI
* [#607](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/607) Editor: Inline text editor should hide the (x) when content is already empty
* [#606](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/606) Editor: When editing a "summary" of an operation, the edit control doesn't close when selecting a different operation
* [#539](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/539) Update JUnit to 4.12
* [#536](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/536) Editor: The "Add Media Type" dialog should check if the media type has already been added
* [#528](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/528) Validation Rule: Check for missing parameter definition for {} in path template
* [#485](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/485) OpenShift:  Split the template into two (separate the auth component from everything else)
* [#360](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/360) Create clustered implementation of editing layer (session, manager)


For more information, please see the Apicurio Studio's official project site:

* [General Information](http://www.apicur.io/)
* [Download/Quickstart](http://www.apicur.io/download)
* [Blog](http://www.apicur.io/blog)
name: Beta 2.24
